thread.title: Star Shuttle Now a Member of the Easybook platform
thread.title_full: Star Shuttle Now a Member of the Easybook platform

author: prbuzz.com
title: Star Shuttle Now a Member of the Easybook platform
text:
10-August-2015 - Easybook.com has been in operation for a decade now, providing online travel bookings for express buses and luxury coaches in Singapore and Peninsular Malaysia, Indonesia, and Thailand. Star Shuttle is a high end bus service line that provides bus services all over Malaysia. Booking for Star Shuttle through Easybook.com will be for the Batu Tiga and Pudu Sentral lines to the central airports:
• Batu Tiga to KLIA/KLIA2 – bus ticket starts from MYR10
• Pudu Sentral to KLIA/KLIA2 – bus ticket starts from MYR12
• KLIA/KLIA2 to Batu Tiga/Pudu Sentral – bus ticket starts from MYR10
“We've very excited to offer Star Shuttle through our services,” Spokesperson explains. “This opens up last minute options for our travelers. Business travelers don't always have the option of planning far ahead. Being able to get this airport run was very important to our business model and we want to welcome this top of the line company to our lineup!”
Easybook.com is all about offering options. The company is the largest online bus, train, ferry, tour, and car booking website in south-east Asia. Each day Easybook.com offers online ticketed for over 7500 bus departures to destinations in Singapore, Thailand, and Malaysia. The website offers multiple choices for the travelers. They can pick from various times, seats, coaches, and sort by prices to find the right choice of travel for them.
To provide this level of service Easybook.com has worked to develop partner relationships with all of the better-known coach and bus companies in the region, companies like:
• Transnasional,
• Plusliner
• NICE
• Konsortium,
• Five Stars
And now Star Shuttle! In addition to providing bus and coach bookings, easybook.com also provides attraction tickets, hotel booking, and more. Easybook.com wants to Singapore and Malaysia's one stop online shop for all their travel needs. For more information on Star Shuttle or to purchase tickets, visit the website at: http://www.easybook.com/en/bus/star-shuttle
